tests:
from solution import min_operations_to_transform, process_test_cases

def test_min_operations_to_transform():
    assert min_operations_to_transform(2) == 1
    assert min_operations_to_transform(3) == 2
    assert min_operations_to_transform(17) == 5
    assert min_operations_to_transform(1) == 0
    assert min_operations_to_transform(4) == 2
    assert min_operations_to_transform(10) == 4

def test_process_test_cases():
    assert process_test_cases(3, [2, 3, 17]) == [1, 2, 5]
    assert process_test_cases(2, [1, 4]) == [0, 2]
